item.description:
â€œ The Card Yankee Swap was so much fun! (thanks Debbie) The gifts were awesome and everyone, I think, got what they wanted, except for Larry who gave me his gift :( Thank you! There was Rum Cake, Flowers, Candy, and free coffee for all :) and lots of skunking going on :( "

A few people, including myself, also got "yodel pickled" until Larry got mad and we put it away!

And Ellen was kind enough to take lots and lots of photos of this F*U*N event!! Thank you Ellen :)
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the back room with our Cribbage Boards O*U*T !
item.name: Waltham Cribbage MeetUp: Let's Get Rid of the Snowy BLahs together !!
